name: Ultimo Software Solutions
tag_list: facility-management-software, maintenance-management-software, fmis, it-service-management-software, real-estate-management-software, software-development
overview:
Ultimo Software Solutions is an independent Dutch Software development company that has been actively involved in development and sales of suitable management systems on the Dutch market since 1988.

Ultimo Software Solutions is supplier of the integrated workplace management system Ultimo Facility Management (facilities management information system), the maintenance management systems; Ultimo Maintenance Management and Ultimo Lite and the IT sevice management system; Ultimo IT Service Management.

As one of the Dutch market leaders, Ultimo has one specific goal: to develop, implement and support high quality standard software and to keep raising the bar for Dutch software development standards. To maintain these goals Ultimo employs the following departments: Research & Development, Customer Support Services, Product & Quality Control, Marketing & Sales and Administration.

Through the years Ultimo has experienced an increase in growth, both national as well as international, with a customer base containing over 900 organisations worldwide, as of today. Ultimo’s Facility Management software is developed to best suit the needs of organisations within a wide variety of branches, ranging from healthcare centers to multinationals and government offices.
